mapper.sql: id, project_name, project_note, delete_flag, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from sys_project where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and delete_flag = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into sys_project (project_name, project_note, delete_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', now(), now())

insert into sys_project
project_name,
project_note,
delete_flag,
create_time,
update_time,
#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projectNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update sys_project
project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_note = #{projectNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
update_time = now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and delete_flag = 'Y'
update sys_project set project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_note = #{projectNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and delete_flag = 'Y'
mapper.select: select count(*) from sys_project where project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_flag = 'Y' limit 1
mapper.update: update sys_project set delete_flag = 'N' where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and delete_flag = 'Y'
mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_project where delete_flag = 'Y'
and project_name like concat('%',replace(replace(#{searchValue},'%','/%'),'_','/_'),'%') escape '/'

select id, project_name, project_note, create_time, (select count(*) from sys_account_project where project_id = id) as numberOfCollaborators, (select count(*) from pj_api_request where projectId = id) as apiTotal from sys_project where delete_flag = 'Y'
and project_name like concat('%',replace(replace(#{searchValue},'%','/%'),'_','/_'),'%') escape '/'
order by update_time desc
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}

select
from sys_project where project_name=#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_flag = 'Y'
